snippet: The iPhone 5 has plenty of new features to keep Apple fans happy. But as Brian X. Chen reports in Thursday's New York Times, there is one feature Apple unveiled that is likely to annoy many: a new connector on the phone's base.
abstract: The iPhone 5 has plenty of new features to keep Apple fans happy. But as Brian X. Chen reports in Thursday's New York Times, there is one feature Apple unveiled that is likely to annoy many: a new connector on the phone's base.

headline.main: Daily Report: An iPhone Tweak That Could Cost You
